tool_description: Generates comprehensive analytics and insights from learner interaction data, progress tracking, and engagement metrics.

metrics.description: Metrics to include: engagement, completion, assessment_performance, time_spent, dropoff_points

granularity.description: Data granularity: hourly, daily, weekly, monthly

error_messages: Invalid course_id: Specified course does not exist.
Invalid date range: End date must be after start date.
Invalid metrics: Use engagement, completion, assessment_performance, time_spent, or dropoff_points.
Invalid granularity: Use hourly, daily, weekly, or monthly.
Insufficient data: Not enough data available for the specified date range.
Invalid export_format: Use summary, detailed, or raw_data.
usage: Provide course_id, date_range_start, date_range_end, and metrics array. Optionally specify granularity, include_demographics, and export_format for customized analytics output.

total_learners.description: Total number of learners in the analytics period

average_engagement_score.description: Average engagement score across all learners (0-100)

total_time_spent_hours.description: Total time spent by all learners in hours

dropoff_modules.description: Module IDs with highest learner dropout rates
